Class SaveFiles

java.lang.Object
util.SaveFiles
public class SaveFiles extends Object
Utility class responsible for saving all in-memory repository data back into their corresponding CSV files.

This class acts as the counterpart to LoadFiles, ensuring that all user accounts, internship opportunities, and request records are persisted to disk whenever updates occur.

The following CSV files are written:

  • student_list.csv
  • staff_list.csv
  • company_rep_list.csv
  • company_rep_req_list.csv
  • withdrawal_req_list.csv
  • internship_opps.csv

All files are saved using UTF-8 encoding.
